title: ENCODE Antibody Validation
description: Schema for submitting antibody validation data

antibody.description: The specific antibody for which the validation image applies.
antibody.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an ENCODE antibody accession or uuid
antibody.title: Antibody to be Validated

lab.comment: Automatic submitters can supply a Lab UUID or Name
lab.title: Lab

award.description: Award (Grant) this submission is registered under
award.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Award UUID, name, or number
award.title: Award Name

document.comment: For automatic submission supply unique a image/document name or uuid
document.title: Validation Image

validation_method.description: Experimental method for the validation image
validation_method.comment: This will likely get mapped to an experimental methods ontology.
validation_method.title: Method

date_validated.description: Date in which the validation experiment was run.
date_validated.title: Date Validated

reference.description: Pubmed id for a published reference
reference.title: Pubmed Reference

status.description: Approval status for the Validation image
status.title: Approval Status
